mapper.select: SELECT C.CC_ID , C.CC_NAME , C.CC_ETC FROM INTEREST_CN B JOIN COM_CODE C ON B.IC_CODE = C.CC_ID WHERE B.MEM_ID = #{memId} ORDER BY B.IC_CODE

SELECT A.MEM_ID , A.FILE_PROFILE , A.MEM_NAME , A.MEM_NICKNAME , A.MEM_EMAIL , A.MEM_GEN , A.MEM_PHONE_NUMBER , A.MEM_BIRTH , A.MEM_POINT , ( SELECT S.SUB_NAME FROM SUBSCRIBE S WHERE S.SUB_ID = ( SELECT P.SUB_ID FROM PAYMENT P WHERE P.PAY_ID = ( SELECT MAX(P2.PAY_ID) FROM PAYMENT P2 WHERE P2.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID ) ) ) AS SUB_NAME , ( SELECT TRUNC(ADD_MONTHS(P.PAY_DATE, 1)) - TRUNC(SYSDATE) FROM PAYMENT P WHERE P.PAY_ID = ( SELECT MAX(P2.PAY_ID) FROM PAYMENT P2 WHERE P2.MEM_ID = A.MEM_ID ) ) AS REMAINING_DAYS FROM MEMBER A WHERE A.MEM_ID = #{memId}
